description: Mas Bes Farm Area in Salitja, Vilobí d'Onyar (Girona). Routes on foot or by bike through the greenways of the municipality. At 900 meters is the hermitage of the Mare de Déu de les Fonts (17th century), at the foot of the La Crosa de Sant Dalmai volcano. Se - Granja Mas Bes offers a free visit to the Museum of the ancient crafts of the field. - Possibility of a guided tour of the farm. Saturdays and Sundays at 11:30 a.m. (ask for availability). Preparation of fresh milk, yogurts, mató and artisan ice creams. Preparation of cannelloni and fresh meat from our calves.

A charming town with lots of history. The rules of your stay are written on a large sign at the entrance: No camping behavior (no chairs/tables/awning), stay 72 hours maximum, keep your pitches and be considerate. But free stay plus electricity 16A, as much as you need, water payable. All newly done, with small trees and benches. A safe place, quiet at night and well lit.

title_short: (08490) Urbanización Tordera Parc - 126 Carrer la Manxa

title: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
title_short: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
description:
Free area for RVs no limit nger than 6.5 meters including water, grey water/potty emptying facilities  
much glass before the cleaning Place!!!
 5 spots for overnight parking (all free of charge). There are also recycling bins right next to the parking, plus a small neighbourhood "supermarket" a few blocks away. There's also a biking route nearby the leads to Girona in one direction (6 km) and Sant Feliu de Guíxols in the other (a tad further...35 km).

Very quiet at night, but a different story in the morning, as it's adjacent to a nursery school (you can guess the rest). Also worth noting: If you're coming from Girona and your navigator suggests the first exit to Quart, take into account that it involves going under a bridge with a 3m height limit, but there's another exit a few hundred metres further.

Please DO remember that this space is shared with local residents--it's actually the parking for the nursery school, so please be discreet and civil. Having spoken to the mayor (who I ran into by mere chance, and is very friendly and understanding), I can confirm that they don't mind us using some of the other spots not reserved for motorhomes, but 1) Only use the spots in the first row, next to the free facilities and 2) PLEASE do not park sideways: it's OK if you stick out a bit, but 3 RVs taking up 15 parking spots in NOT OK. It's rare to find FREE spots like this, so please be respectful, if not out of gratitude, for continuity's sake, or in the long run they'll end up being removed. Whether we choose to see it this way or not, we *are* indeed a community, our actions will surely affect those who come after us.

title: (17242) Quart - Km 7 Carrer Cira de Girona

title: (08490) Tordera - Carrer Estacio
description: The Motorhome area in Tordera, is located just 5 minutes walk from the town center, has almost all the services, it is also surrounded by nature, right next to a park so that the little ones can enjoy nature, in addition It has a barbecue area and community pool for the summer, on Sundays they have a market and it is very large. There is also a community scale in case you want to weigh the air conditioner. At least for our huge SAT system, it is not possible to find an Astra satellite because of the trees. Internet is almost impossible in this area. Driving cars throw up a lot of dust. We are disappointed with the supply and disposal facility. It is not accessible for large motorhomes with a storage tank.

title: (08490) Tordera - Carrer Estacio
description: Large stadium parking, next to service area, unusable unloadable drain platform (flooded), plus a lot of noise, music, very good night

title: (17244) Cassà de la Selva - 31 Carrer Ronda de la Sardana
title_short: (17244) Cassà de la Selva - 31 Carrer Ronda de la Sardana
description: Faucet at the playground

title: (17006) Girona - Carrer del Poble Sahrauí
description:
Quiet parking in the center of Girona.  
We stayed there (sleeping in the car) 1 night in the middle of August and it was empty ! There are several trees so it's perfect for the mornings. 
It is front of Aldi, Lidl, and McDonalds (you can charge your phone there, go to the bathroom and have free wifi) I didn't have any problem during the night and the morning

title: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
title_short: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
description: Perfect place to sleep and do green via carrilet bike, we were 2 nights advised by the firemen next door, there are tables and barbecue, no toilets or other services but in the village of Amer we find everything, ideal for lovers of the bike and walks

address.street: 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras

title: (17153) Sant Martí de Llémena - GI-531
description: Beautiful luxury, with walking routes, quiet. does not suppose of services but good lujar

title: (08490) Tordera - 29 Carretera Fogars
description: Public parking in the town of Tordera with restaurants and supermarkets opposite. Near the historic center. You cannot stay overnight on Saturdays because on Sunday the village market is held there.

title: (17007) Girona - Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor
title_short: (17007) Girona - Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor
description:
A parking lot not far from the city in a small lighted park.

Not necessarily a quiet place, but we were able to spend a night and a day here with our motorhome, which is over 7 meters long.

address.street: Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor

title: (17170) Amer - 140 Carrer Santa Brígida
description: Parking available next to river bank by the municipal sports center (football etc.)  quiet and space for several motorhomes.  adjacent to town.

title: (17401) Arbúcies - GI-543
description: Water point just below the highway. We were told by locals it's potable water. You filled yourself a lot of bottles.

title: (17152) Sant Martí de Llémena - GI-531
description: Parking parking maximum 24 hours. Without services, only garbage. Well leveled and large. Next to the road, and near a verse farm, little traffic and does not smell bad despite the farm. A stream passes by the side. The green and nice location.

title: (17166) Susqueda - Camí de Sant Martí
description: Good paved site right next to the dam. Very quiet and beautiful and suitable for any type of vehicle.

title: (17004) Girona - 34 Carrer del Carme
description: Public parking near the historic center to park and get to know the city. Small vehicles only

title: (17007) Girona - 46 Carrer Bullidors-domeny
description: Unpaved parking 3 km from the center of Girona - accessible on foot, by bike or by bus. Possibility of evacuation, drinking water. Located at the end of the airport runway, it is flown over until 11 p.m.

title: (17001) Girona - 35 Passeig de la Devesa
description: Clay parking without marking on the ground, free, good for motorhomes

title: (17002) Girona - 9 Carrer Juli Garreta
description: Senderismo

name: Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
title: (17001) Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
description: The Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas is located in the Pasaje de Massaguer with location by means of the coordinates 41º59'03.2 "N and 02º48'50.1" E. Central and very well located to visit the city of Girona and its cultural heritage: the Cathedral, the neighborhood Jewish, the Arab baths, the Ramblas, the wall, the Devesa. It has 37 spaces with exclusive access for parking users, has personal assistance during working hours and is equipped with video surveillance and permanent lighting. There are intercom points inside and outside the area, to be able to communicate with the staff of the center. Parking users have differentiated health services for women, men and people with disabilities. The establishment allows you to spend the night and has a supply of drinking water, electric charge and evacuation, gray water and waste water and free WIFI service.

address.street: 14 Passatge Massaguer (Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas). Email: clientes@empark.com

title: (08490) Tordera - 13 Carrer Roger de Llúria
description: A big and free parking space close to the center of the city. Just one road passing by so it is pretty quiet. Separated trash bins are next to the road, 50m from the parking space

title: (17001) Girona - 28 Carrer Camp de Mart
description: Ideal parking for visiting with bar and park around. Only the central part of the car park can be used for motorhomes

title: (17001) Girona - 38 Passeig de la Devesa
description: Nice wide parking strip between the river and the Parc de la Devesa. (there's a smaller car park on the entrance, it's not that one, just follow the road where it shows a cul-de-sac /dead end sign). No parking Tuesdays and Saturdays as there's a market. Busy on nice days I imagine. Fresh water at several places in the park, but not near the parking. 10 minute walk to the old town.

title: (17404) Riells i Viabrea - 11 Carrer Morou
description: Parking with approximately 30 spaces with a public bathroom that can get you out of an emergency

title: (17007) Girona - Carretera de Taialà
description: Free parking, good parking

title: (17001) Girona - 12 Carrer del Riu Güell
description: Parking of the Devesa.

title: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan
title_short: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan
description: Large tarmac free parking without any service, in front of the large basketball hall. Very convenient for visiting the city by bike. Several motorhomes parked with us that day. We were parked there all day without a problem.

address.street: 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan

title: (08476) Sant Celoni - 5 Carretera Nova
description: Behind the Repsol petrol station in La Batllòria, the Condis supermarket is next door. Large unpaved esplanade, quiet place. There is a toilet at the gas station. The front bar opens at 05:00. Pharmacy nearby.

title: (08490) Tordera - 25 Carrer de Maragall
description: Free dirt vacant lot without shade near the center. We have spent the night in a camper van and very calm (April). On Sundays there is a market nearby.

title: (17166) Susqueda - 21 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: Wonderful place to sleep and spend the day with spectacular views of the distance and the susqueda dam. There are two picnic tables covered by a small roof. 360° view of the mountain range, easily accessible by van.

title: (17007) Girona - 45 Carrer de Fontajau
description: Parking next to the city of Fontejau.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 50 Carrer de Fivaller
description: Quiet location 2 minutes from downtown. It is located near the cycle track and a park.

title: (17004) Girona - 91 Carretera S Feliu Guíxols - Vilarroja
title_short: (17004) Girona - 91 Carretera S Feliu Guíxols - Vilarroja
description: Enough space, some grass, enough to stay overnight near the city

title: (17007) Girona - Passeig de la Devesa
description: Parking for van or van near the park and the historic center.

title: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
title_short: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
description: Free parking, 10 to 15 minutes walk from the historic old town. In the back area it is quiet, partly shady, with no through traffic and barely visible from the residential buildings in the neighborhood. For Wohmobile rather not suitable, but you do not stand out with a smaller vehicle (eg VW T4, Vito...) and has its rest. Occasionally someone walks by with their dog or visitors to the adjoining restaurant may use the car park (if this one still exists). For accompanying children there is a small playground within sight.

address.street: 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca

title: (17240) Llagostera - 16 Carrer Panedes
description: Free parking

title: (17004) Girona - 9 Carrer de la Muralla
description: In the street next to the university parking lot we had no problem parking at night, quiet area. In the morning there was more car noise.

title: (17007) Girona - 1 Rambla de Xavier Cugat
description: Large free parking on hard ground. Ability to stay overnight, a bit far from the city center, otherwise quiet location.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 6179 Carrer Rafael Mas Ripoll
description: Free zone with filling and emptying of gray water, next to the municipal swimming pool very nice air thanks to the municipality we will come back to visit this very beautiful village. Community open WIFI.

title: (17007) Girona - Pont de Pedret
description: Free parking. ideal for visiting gerone city.

title: (17004) Girona - 9 Carrer de la Muralla
description: University parking only weekends. We have slept there with our 7 meter nasturtium and no problems. 1 minute from the entrance by the wall and scarce 5 of the cathedral. Ideal for vans

title: (17007) Girona - 30 Avinguda de França
description: Free parking next to the Mercadona

title: (17240) Llagostera -
description: Magnificent location very isolated in the middle of the forest (alone in the world). A magnificent view of the sea and its sunrise and on the other side a view of the mountains and its sunset. Very accessible places we went there with our heavy weight (be careful it climbs). The place can accommodate a heavy pea or two vans.

title: (17405) Espinelves - GI 543
description: C 25 Coll de Ravell, gas station and restaurant.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 57 Avinguda del Gironès
description: AC parking (nearby there is another in the sports center), paved access, next to a supermarket and parks next door. There are also restaurants and cafes nearby. It is not championship season, on weekends it is likely that in the morning there will be movement for basketball games.

title: (17007) Girona - 54 Avinguda de França
description: Self-service laundry. Hours from 7 a.m. to 9 p.m. It has 6 washing machines (8, 14 and 18kg) and 6 14kg dryers. There are vending machines for coffee and snacks. They also have a washer and dryer for pet clothes. Lots of free parking around, a large supermarket (Carrefour) and self-service gas station. Fast and efficient service, very good aroma in the clothes and the dryers with 20 minutes and at maximum dries everything very well.

title: (17300) Les Planes - Unnamed Road
description: Access only for van, location at the edge of the track. Very quiet and rising sun.

name: Càmping del Parc Gualba
title: (08474) Càmping del Parc Gualba
description: Gualba, 21 Diseminado Afueras. Càmping del Parc Gualba

title: (17007) Girona - 92 Carrer de Pedret
description: Free parking along the river and next to a bar 10 minutes walk from the cathedral. The spaces are not delimited so we went there with a Peugeot Boxer bike (6m). Frightened by the many comments on thefts and burglaries, we did not trust us to leave it in a large parking lot. We asked the other people who parked for information and they said it was better to get back to the camper before it got dark.

title: (17840) Sarriá de Ter - 101 N-IIa
description: Repsol gas dealers, sale and exchange of gas bottles, you can even buy an adapter for German connections if you don't have one, super friendly, easy communication thanks to Google translator :-) 1a service

title: (08474) Gualba - 141 Diseminado Afueras
description: Parking behind the cemetery and next to a hermitage, surrounded by trees and a river nearby. There are garbage containers and it is clean to keep it that way. Near the Gualba Environmental Park, perfect for routes

title: (08470) - 163 Diseminado Afueras
description: Great parking, surrounded by nature and with the restaurant next door. From here you can make the routes to the marsh or the peaks of agudes and montseny. The weekend of semaana is usually very frequented of vehicles

title: (08470) Barcelona - 155 Diseminado Afueras
description: La Guardiola esplai area. There are public services (bathrooms) with toilet paper. They are not always open, but it does not indicate hours. There are also plenty of concrete tables and a drinking fountain, as well as recycling bins. There are no barbecues. There is the possibility of starting routes from here. There is space to park about 10 cars - vans. Parking space is very tight for a large motorhome. In the car park, it does NOT indicate that overnight stays are prohibited (parking from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.). We were having breakfast and there were two vans staying overnight. It is next to the road, but at night there is no traffic (after 7.30 some cars and motorcycles begin to pass).

title: (08479) Barcelona - 20 BV-5114
description: Good place to spend the night in the departure area of numerous routes. Quiet and in the middle of nature. A public bathroom, without water when we were there, but I imagine it usually has drinking water.

title: (17171) Susqueda - 16 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: We stayed the night and everything was very quiet, but we did not lift the roof because we were next to a bar and very close to houses.

title: (08474) Gualba - 39 Carrer de Eugeni d' Ors
title_short: (08474) Gualba - 39 Carrer de Eugeni d' Ors
description: Right at the information point. We have asked and they tell us that you can spend the night without problems

title: (08474) Gualba - 60 BV-5115
description: Parking for cars or vans. We spent the night here And super quiet, a small but very cozy town one block away there is a park with a fountain, the truth is we slept very well, although in other areas of the town there is more and less frequented

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar -
description: Parking lot that is often used during the day for walks in the forest. Located in front of a now unused golf course. It is often used by motocross riders on nice days. Quiet in the evening. Normally standing there for one or two nights is no problem. No thoroughfare. The road is unpaved but wide and easy to drive on. The last picture is taken about 200 m further, I could actually turn around well with my vehicle a concrete gully there is no people at all and I slept very well.

title: (17244) Cassà de la Selva -
description: Good place to walk and visit its beautiful forest and its paths, close to the town of Cassa de la Selva, with tables for picnics and ample parking.

title: (17199) Canet d'Adri - 2 Avinguda de Rocacorba
description: Small park between two roads at the entrance to Canet d'Adri. It is very quiet, there are benches, tables and garbage. Ideal to come with animals. The police passed by several times and we were without any problem with tables and camping.

title: (17401) El Colls - BV-5114
description: Hiking car park as a starting point for hiking on the Turo de l'Home. No sign prohibiting overnight parking. We didn't stand overnight. Unfortunately only a few straight parking spaces.

title: (17310) Condado del Jaruco -
description: Nice place quiet but bad path only 4x4!

title: (17401) El Colls -
description: Place in the middle of nature next to the road. Very calm. It is located at an intersection of dirt roads but you can park without getting in the way. There are hardly any vehicles. It is one of the few places in the area where there is some mobile coverage. Access can be tricky but it's worth it. The dirt track is narrow for most of the way. With L2H2 there is no problem. But I do not recommend larger vehicles such as motorhomes. The inconvenience is if you find a vehicle in front of you. If you go two, I recommend that one go to the destination to prevent another vehicle from getting on.

title: (08469) Montseny - GIV-5114
description: Parking in the middle of the mountain view nice pose lunch we must be able to sleep there

title: (17007) Girona - 142 Carrer de Sant Daniel
description: Parking of the recreational area, very beautiful near Girona, equipped with picnic tables and barbecues. Shaded parking area. You have to walk about 200m from the parking lot to the area.

title: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
title_short: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Beautiful corner in the woods, at the foot of the road, before reaching the Turó de l'Home car park where you can only park from 8am to 8pm. Two camper vans are sure to fit. 1 AC, I find it difficult because there is like a small rsmoit / mound to park in the grove. NEW NOTE. In the middle of the morning a man came and told me that you couldn't park here. I asked him if he was a park authority and he said yes. I told him to identify himself and he laughed. He told me to leave or they would come and fine me. I told him that I was not going to go, that I was not camping and that I would call park information. I called park information, told them where I was and they told me that if there was no prohibition sign, I could park without problems. It is true that after a while the Mossos d'Escuadra passed just ahead and told me absolutely nothing.

title: (08389) Mas Carbó - 22 Carrer Emilia Pardo Bazán
title_short: (08389) Mas Carbó - 22 Carrer Emilia Pardo Bazán
description: Water fountain at the playground. (Probably tap water) Next to a residential area

title: (08479) - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Large and flat esplanade. It is a detour from the main road. You can spend the night without problem during day and night. Near a route to visit the turo de l'home. No services

title: (17405) Espinelves - 16 GV-5441
description: Roadside esplanade, very close to Espinelves. We slept very peacefully and it was perfect to go to the Fir Fair.

title: (17004) Girona - GIV-6703
description: A Lay-by, nice place to one night.

title: (08389) Palafolls - 28 Carrer Camí del Castell
description: Small parking lot at a very beautiful castle ruins you can visit (no museum or something ... you can move freely) Very beautiful all-round view. the road is tarmacked, sometimes a bit tight for bigger cars, no problem for vans. We did not stay here but it did not seem like there were any problems.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 79 Carrer Joan Miró
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 79 Carrer Joan Miró
description:
At the back of Aldi...just a little lane sheltered from the cold in the winter...
quiet and no one bothered me.

title: (17405) Espinelves - 18 Carrer de Vic
description: Superb area where you can  visit this beautiful village of Les Guilleries. Very quiet place, located at the entrance of the village. There are two parking areas, located on both sides of the street, although I recommend the one on the left, to facilitate access and range (it's an old football field).

title: (17166) El Far - 73 Barri el Far
description: Parking at the foot of the lighthouse sanctuary, spectacular views, barbecue area, bar and children's playground. We do not know if you can sleep, being a holiday we have stopped in the BUS zone to take some photos from the viewpoint.

title: (08470) San Celoni - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Small place with trees and 4 places for picnic.

title: (17007) Girona - 8 Carrer Embusteros
description: Simple, quiet parking lot. There are public, freely accessible toilets at the gas station nearby.

title: (08479) - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Pitch in the mountains. Hiking parking at 1650m altitude. No infrastructure but great views.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Carrer Modest Cuixart
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Carrer Modest Cuixart
description: Free parking day and night for water word guests no service but quiet for the night against many mosquitoes

title: (17405) Espinelves - GV-5441
description: Parking to visit the Masjoan arboretum

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 37 Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 37 Avinguda de les Alegries
description: Huge parking lot of well leveled sand, Free Day Very quiet.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 191 Avinguda de Vidreres
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 191 Avinguda de Vidreres
description: We parked next to the market and slept

title: (17244) Santa Pellaia - 9 GI-664
description:
Next to some vineyards with beautiful view to the landscape. Quiet place - only two two cars passed until midi. 
Easy to reach by a gravel path 150m from main road.

title: (08469) - 2 Diseminado Sant Marcal
description:
Parking next to the top of Sant Marçal, better than the others. One is galazota and the other is small and unbalanced. Next to it, there is a path to a hill with a cross.
==
Aparkalekua Sant Marçal gainaren ondoan, besteak baino hobeagoa. Bat galazota dago eta bestea txikia eta ezorekatua dago. Alboan bidexka bat dago gurutzea duen tontortxu batera.

title: (08469) Montseny - BV-5114
description: We spend a night at this point, it is the beginning of the road that goes up to the Matagalls. We spent the night alone without problem, being a very busy place for hiking at 7 in the morning there was already movement

title: (17300) Blanes - 6240 Carrer del Primer de Maig
title_short: (17300) Blanes - 6240 Carrer del Primer de Maig
description: Car wash for motorhomes, campers, has a walkway to wash the roofs, solar panels, skylights, etc ...

title: (17406) - GIV-5201
description: Parking without services at the start of excursions / treekings.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - Av. de Vidreres
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - Av. de Vidreres
description: Clay lot, 23mins from the beach.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Avinguda de les Alegries
description: Parking in front of a shopping center with a supermarket. Restrooms are available in the mall when it is open. About 20 parking spaces.

name: Càmping Tucan
title: (17310) Càmping Tucan
description: Camping Tucan, good pool especially for children, good plots at the start of the campsite. small farm. bathrooms and shower ok. Nearby supermarkets. bus stop in front.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Avinguda de les Regions
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Avinguda de les Regions
description: Laundry service

title: (17300) Blanes - 136 Carretera Accés Costa Brava
description: Service area of garage has water for fill up.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carrer de Plató
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carrer de Plató
description:
Parking lot without facilities. No prohibition signs and one of the few places where you can park along a road. Also available for larger motorhomes. At about 20 to 25 minutes walking distance from the beach of Lloret. Close to a large supermarket and several eateries. Like all other places in Lloret de Mar, it is of course a matter of luck. In the end we did not stay overnight ourselves, but we were able to park for free until 9:30 PM, after we were refused as a camper at 2 paid parking facilities.

Note: as a camper you are absolutely not welcome at paid parking spaces that are secured.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - s/n Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - s/n Avinguda de les Alegries
description:
LIDL car parks, about thirty places are in the open area (therefore no height limit) but the rest are underground.
Parking very good for visiting Lloret, we stayed there from morning to evening without fear of being robbed because there is a lot of traffic in this car park.
Totally free.

title: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious place, where to spend the night without problems. Lots of shade and easy access.

name: Camping Santa Elena Ciutat
title: (17310) Camping Santa Elena Ciutat
description: Camping Santa Elena with all amenities: Pool Bar, Restaurant/Bar, Supermarket, Barbecue Area, Mini Golf, Entertainment Small and large plots from 19.90 euros (acsi card accepted). 1.5 km walk from the city center and 900m from the beach. Open exceptionally for this year until November 6, 2022.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Carrer dels Ferrers
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Carrer dels Ferrers
description: Sandy free parking. To access it is a high neighborhood it can cost a bit to climb if the vehicle is heavy. It has views of the town and a quiet place in the middle of the summer season. If you want to go to the town you have to walk a while.

title: (17300) Blanes - 47 Avinguda de la Pau
description: Quiet and safe place to spend the night, it has a supermarket in front and you can go downtown on foot.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 21 Carrer de Sòcrates
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 21 Carrer de Sòcrates
description: Pitch for 1-2 nights ok.  Not too quiet but safe.  Space for 2 campers as space is used by local residents.

title: (08389) Palafolls - 3 Les Conquilles
description: Quiet place next to the town, supermarket and outlet stores nearby.
